amendment.description: To provide for the supplemental subsistence allowance, imminent danger pay, family separation allowance, and certain federal assistance to be cumulative benefits; and to require a report on availability of social services to members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3173 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3173 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Alexander. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To provide for the supplemental subsistence allowance, imminent danger pay, family separation allowance, and certain federal assistance to be cumulative benefits; and to require a report on availability of social services to members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3173 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Alexander.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3173 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
